div.a: The Twitter-Instagram Filter Wars Have Arrived

div.div: On the the same afternoon that Instagram updated its mobile apps with a new filter called Willow, Twitter debuted long rumored photo filters of its own Monday. And so the social-media filter wars begin.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T2za6h&via=Digg&text=The Twitter-Instagram Filter Wars Have Arrived

div.div: The core decision: It's not your site — it's theirs. Losing Instagram images, and the right to vote.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W0o3f3&via=Digg&text=Facebook Democracy Is Dead

div.a: McDonald's Pretzelnator Not Golden In Germany

div.div: Not even the relatively brief appearance of the crowd-sourced Pretzelnator burger McDonald’s launched earlier this year got Germans excited about eating there.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TR9739&via=Digg&text=McDonald's Pretzelnator Not Golden In Germany

div.div: THE OTHER YOU IS DEFINITELY COOLER

div.a: 5 Reasons We May Live In A Multiverse

div.div: The universe we live in may not be the only one out there. In fact, our universe could be just one of an infinite number of universes making up a "multiverse."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TP2uMA&via=Digg&text=5 Reasons We May Live In A Multiverse

div.a: How Do You Market Sexy Depends?

div.div: Founded by 25-year-old Julia Sygiel, a recent chemical engineering grad, Dear Kate underwear has a patent-pending liner made from a thin wicking material that holds up to three teaspoons of liquid.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VNkuMG&via=Digg&text=How Do You Market Sexy Depends?

div.a: How To Train For Long-Duration Spaceflight

div.div: Some of this training – much of it, in fact – is not pretty or glamorous or easy. But it will get you to one of the most unique destinations that humans have ever gone.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RYQGeP&via=Digg&text=How To Train For Long-Duration Spaceflight

div.a: FBI To Sell 'Foreboding, Horrifying And Hideous' Headquarters?

div.div: Just six blocks from the White House, the FBI's hulking headquarters overlooking Pennsylvania Avenue has long been the government building everyone loves to hate.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UwA2Qt&via=Digg&text=FBI To Sell 'Foreboding, Horrifying And Hideous' Headquarters?

div.a: The Nautical Roots Of The Modern Tattoo

div.div:
Were tattoos previously only for underworld miscreants? Why did sailors love them so? Hello sailor, indeed!
collectorsweekly.com/artic...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RZgLdH&via=Digg&text=The Nautical Roots Of The Modern Tattoo

div.a: The Fungus In Your Cheese Is Having Weird Sex

div.div: It turns out that the fungi in cheeses like blue cheese aren’t just sitting there, waiting for you to eat them. They’re getting it on.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SRopVT&via=Digg&text=The Fungus In Your Cheese Is Having Weird Sex

div.div: YOU WOULDN'T LIKE HIM WHEN HE'S ANGRY

div.a: The Oatmeal's Furious Takedown Of His Own BuzzFeed Profile

div.div: Last week, BuzzFeed contributor Jack Steuf wrote a profile on The Oatmeal. Today, The Oatmeal responded.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T1LYJY&via=Digg&text=The Oatmeal's Furious Takedown Of His Own BuzzFeed Profile

div.div: How a mayor set out to save a Sicilian city from neglect and Mafia influence.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UtpPlo&via=Digg&text=The Anti-Godfather

div.a: Bleeding Internally? Seal It With This DARPA Foam

div.div: This injectable foam expands in the body to compress internal wounds. Animal tests have shown it reduces blood loss six-fold.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SMmi4j&via=Digg&text=Bleeding Internally? Seal It With This DARPA Foam

div.div: MORE PROOF THAT TURTLES ARE CODDLED

div.a: Cold Sea Turtles Flown From New England To Florida

div.div: More than two dozen sea turtles stressed by cold ocean waters have been airlifted from New England to recover in balmy Florida.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vqcz2g&via=Digg&text=Cold Sea Turtles Flown From New England To Florida

div.a: AOL Postpones Premiere Of Hip-Hop-Inspired TV Commercial

div.div: It was supposed to have it all: a wardrobe from the stylist of the "Mo Money Mo Problems" music video, a Jonah Hill voiceover, and prime ad spots tonight during the telecasts of Monday Night Football and "The Voice."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SMx1vy&via=Digg&text=AOL Postpones Premiere Of Hip-Hop-Inspired TV Commercial

div.a: 1970s Drawings Of NASA's Future Space Stations

div.div: In the 1970s with the moon landing still fresh and man living amongst the stars seemed only a short time away, NASA's Ames Research Center imagined what it would all look like.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uwbc30&via=Digg&text=1970s Drawings Of NASA's Future Space Stations

div.a: What The CIA Thinks The World Will Look Like In 2030

div.div: Here's the CIA's best guess about where we'll be in 18 years.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VZSOkd&via=Digg&text=What The CIA Thinks The World Will Look Like In 2030

div.a: 'Captain, I Saved The Bridge': Boldly Going Where No TV Set Has Gone Before

div.div: Restoring the Enterprise-D bridge while saving a piece of our memories.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SQAASK&via=Digg&text='Captain, I Saved The Bridge': Boldly Going Where No TV Set Has Gone Before

div.a: Here's A Computer Screen On A Contact Lens

div.div: Over in Belgium, scientists have finally taken a crucial step toward building screens into contact lenses.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UQ2cYX&via=Digg&text=Here's A Computer Screen On A Contact Lens

div.a: Why Gmail, Chrome, And Drive Went Down Today

div.div: Google has yet to offer an official explanation for the widespread outages that hit Gmail, Drive, Chrome, and more of its products late this morning, but explanations are beginning to surface for a minor Internet plague that continues into the afternoon.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RY5r1E&via=Digg&text=Why Gmail, Chrome, And Drive Went Down Today

div.a: Hacker Group GhostShell Claims Attack On FBI, Interpol, NASA And Pentagon

div.div: The hacktivist group GhostShell today announced its biggest attack yet: #ProjectWhiteFox, which targets the ESA, the FBI, the Federal Reserve, Interpol, NASA, and the Pentagon, as well as many companies that partner with these organizations.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TPMAEW&via=Digg&text=Hacker Group GhostShell Claims Attack On FBI, Interpol, NASA And Pentagon

div.a: The Wall Street Journal's Photos Of The Year

div.div: The title says it all. Click and enjoy!

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TMoms8&via=Digg&text=The Wall Street Journal's Photos Of The Year

div.a: Tom Cruise's Ex-Girlfriend And Other Former Scientologists Lash Out In Anti-Scientology Rap

div.div: Scientology damages people. For proof, look no further than this bizarre anti-Scientology rap produced by a who's who of prominent apostate members of the cult—from its former top spokesman to Tom Cruise's former confessor to Cruise's Xenu-approved ex-girlfriend.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TPT8mS&via=Digg&text=Tom Cruise's Ex-Girlfriend And Other Former Scientologists Lash Out In Anti-Scientology Rap

div.a: This BuzzFeed List Will Restore Your Faith In Marriage

div.div: Meet some of the couples that were married on Washington's first day of marriage equality (or, a bunch of pictures that will make you cry).

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vv6nGb&via=Digg&text=This BuzzFeed List Will Restore Your Faith In Marriage

div.a: Falling In Love With A Bot

div.div: When robots look like people or pets, it's hard not to develop feelings for them.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U6HWPh&via=Digg&text=Falling In Love With A Bot

div.a: Russian Hackers Break Into Australian Medical Clinic's Patient Records, Demand $4,000 Ransom

div.div: A Gold Coast, Australia medical practice has been held to ransom by a group of Russian hackers. The hackers encrypted the practice’s patient database, rendering it unusable until decrypted.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UwIHlY&via=Digg&text=Russian Hackers Break Into Australian Medical Clinic's Patient Records, Demand $4,000 Ransom

div.div: TRUST NO ONE, NOT EVEN YOURSELF

div.a: Why The Only Secure Password Is One You Don't Even Know That You Know

div.div: Researchers have shown how to teach a password subconsciously, then pluck it back out.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V5ukDC&via=Digg&text=Why The Only Secure Password Is One You Don't Even Know That You Know

div.a: Futuristic Handcuffs Would Administer Shocks, Drugs

div.div: A patent for next-generation handcuffs offers a future in which the detained can be zapped directly from their restraints, and even injected with a medication, sedative, irritant, paralytic, or other fine substance.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TSSHFo&via=Digg&text=Futuristic Handcuffs Would Administer Shocks, Drugs

div.a: Inside The U.S. Army's Secret Plan To Wage War With Psychedelic Drugs

div.div: Colonel James S. Ketchum became the military’s leading expert in a secret Cold War experiment: to fight enemies with clouds of psychochemicals that temporarily incapacitate the mind—causing, in the words of one ranking officer, a “selective malfunctioning of the human machine.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U8xTsV&via=Digg&text=Inside The U.S. Army's Secret Plan To Wage War With Psychedelic Drugs

div.div: Benjamin Kyle has been suffering from amnesia since he was found nearly beaten to death behind a fast food restaurant in 2004. A filmmaker's documentary and Internet campaign hope to uncover his identity and get him a new social security number.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VLxqmf&via=Digg&text=Do You Know This Man?

div.div: Here's a look at the tenure of around 700 leaders sorted by political longevity in the world's autocratic and anocratic countries, along with a selection from present-day democracies, since 1950 or thereabouts.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UrErSy&via=Digg&text=How Educated Are World Leaders?
